# Tailwind CSS v4 Patterns

Quick reference for Tailwind CSS v4 patterns.

---

## Quick Reference

### Required Steps After Adding shadcn/ui

```bash
npx shadcn@latest add {component} -y
./scripts/fix-tailwind-v4-css-vars.sh --yes apps/{app}/components/ui
```

### CSS Variable Syntax (Important)

```tsx
// BAD: v3 syntax (old format generated by CLI)
className="bg-[--sidebar-background]"

// GOOD: v4 syntax
className="bg-[var(--sidebar-background)]"
```

### Production-Only Issues

```css
/* Use @theme inline instead of @property */
@theme inline {
  --sidebar-width: 16rem;
  --sidebar-width-icon: 3rem;
}
```

---

## Key Points

- Use `npx shadcn@latest` for shadcn/ui
- CLI generates `[--var]` -> must convert to `[var(--var)]`
- If CSS variables don't work in production, use `@theme inline`
- Always run the fix script after adding components
